## Why Weight Matters in Gaming Mice

Before diving into our picks, let's address the elephant in the room: **why does sub-60g matter?**

According to ergonomics research and professional gaming community consensus, lightweight mice can reduce fatigue during extended gaming sessions and may enable faster, more precise movements. Many professional esports players have adopted mice under 70g, according to tournament equipment lists and player interviews published by organizations like ESPN Esports and official team announcements.

The principle is straightforward‚Äîless mass requires less force to move, which can translate to quicker adjustments and potentially reduced wrist strain over time.

However, lighter isn't always better for everyone. Some players prefer more heft for stability and control. That's why we've included comparison options above 60g for those who want the full context.
